definitions.definition: Depending on alms for a living .
Of or pertaining to a beggar .
Of or pertaining to a member of a religious order forbidden to own property, and who must beg for a living.

main_definition: Depending on alms for a living .
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to a beggar .
Of or pertaining to a member of a religious order forbidden to own property, and who must beg for a living.
